resources.string: Discovery of New Native Plant Species in NEOM
The Ministry of Environment, Water, and Agriculture (MEWA) and NEOM have identified native plant species previously unrecorded in Saudi Arabia.
Siemens Energy Secures 1.6 Billion Power Plant Project
Siemens Energy has been awarded a 1.6 billion contract to supply technology for two gas-fired power plants in Saudi Arabia.
Saudi-Owned Scopely Acquires Pokémon Go in 3.5 Billion Deal
Scopely, a Saudi-owned game developer, has purchased Pokémon Go and other apps from Niantic for $3.5 billion.
Controversial Saudi TV Series Muawiya Debuts
The Saudi production Muawiya,a 100 million TV series portraying the life of the early Islamic ruler Muawiya ibn Abi Sufyan, has stirred controversy in the Middle East.
Discovery of Five Species New to Global Science in Royal Reserve
The Prince Mohammed bin Salman Royal Reserve announced the discovery of five species new to global science, three species previously unrecorded in Saudi Arabia, and 34 new global range extensions.
Record OPEC+ Fuel Exports Amid Crude Supply Cuts
Despite OPEC+ members cutting crude oil output, increased exports of refined fuel products have lessened the impact on global supply.
